about_the_game:
Piracy has never been this fun! Sail the high seas, plundering booty. Start off in a small ship that you can use to ram other ships to plunder their gold. As you explore and discover new locations, you can upgrade your ships features or even buy a new one. The choice is yours.

The Highlights

  • Defeat Navy ships for special upgrades
  • Fight a Kraken
  • Discover Pirate's cove, a hub of scum and villainy
  • Quests allow you to take on profitable missions
  • Raid other pirates to uncover their hidden pirate stash



Looking for more to do than chase after random merchant vessels or dispatch the occasional wayward Navy ship? Then you need Quests! Take on a fleet of merchants to liberate them of their cargo, face the local Navy and make the local area safe for your fellow pirates or perhaps for a more exotic quest, you could take on the Kraken!



Do you find that your ship just isn't fast enough or tough enough to take on those big old Navy ships? Then you need upgrades! Head on over to the Pirates Cove for the very best in ship upgades. The shipwright there can provide you with bigger and tougher hulls, weapons and other fun items to help you plunder the high seas.

The Road Map

Chapter 1. The initial release into early access. This is where it all begins. The Pirates Cove point of interest is ready. Quests are available. Upgrades and New ships can be obtained.

Chapter 2. The Eastern Update. This update brings Eastern ships, cargo and technology, more points of interest to explore and profitable trade routes to take advantage of and plunder

Chapter 3. The Battle Update. This update overhauls the battle system to optimize how the game plays against a variety of foes and upgrade's their AI to better defend themselves.

Chapter 4. The Trade Update. Perhaps you grow weary of the constant struggle of hunting down merchant vessels in order to liberate them of their cargo. Instead, make good use of your plundered gold to run a profitable merchant operation where you buy exotic commodities and sell them for a profit. If you can get them to their destination of course.

Chapter 5. The Polish Update. This update focuses on both visual and audio improvements. More music, better special effects. Quality of life enhancements to the UI and game play. If all goes well, this should be the final release before exiting Early Access.
